name: fluffy-tail
effect: Used in battle : Ends a wild battle. Cannot be used in trainer battles.

flavor_text.black_white: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.
